EMPLOYEE SHARE PLAN

In financial year 2014, Share plan under the Nera Telecommunications Performance Share Plan 2014 (“NeraTel PSP 2014”) to eligible director and other employees of the Company was approved by the shareholders.

During the financial year, no shares (2016: Nil) were granted under the employee share plan.

COMMITMENTS

(a) Capital commitments There are no capital expenditure contracted as at the balance sheet date.

(b) Non-cancellable operating lease commitments — as lessee As at 31 December 2017, the Group has commitments under operating leases for equipment, office and warehouse. The leases have remaining tenure of between 1 and 25 years.
